name: Spillmetrics
description: Spillmetrics is a platform designed to help traders track and analyze their trading progress. It allows users to maintain a journal of their trades, offering insights to improve performance and make better trading decisions.

name: Zainab Wahab
description: I built a portfolio for Zainab Wahab, a Nigerian product designer, featuring interactive elements and visuals that showcase my frontend development skills.

name: AITI
description: AITI (African Institute of Technology and Innovation) is an educational platform designed to empower African youths with in-demand tech skills. Their programs aim to bridge the gap between African talent and the global tech industry by offering courses in areas such as frontend and backend development, product management, AI, cybersecurity, cloud computing, blockchain, and more.

name: Support Widget (Open Source)

name: Riltee
description: Riltee helps it users Invest in high-yield rental properties and start getting rental income with ease.

name: Eventark
description: Eventark makes creating and sharing of event easily for users, also take records of users attending and payment made.

name: Invoice Tool
description: A webapp used for creating and printing of invoice.

name: Greedy Hunter
description: A game built with vue js. The aim is to eat all the food in the game
